      • getBattleStatus

        public int getBattleStatus()
        -----battlestatus------ b0 = undefined (reserved for future use) b1 = ready (0=not ready, 1=ready) b2..b5 = team no. (from 0 to 15. b2 is LSB, b5 is MSB) b6..b9 = ally team no. (from 0 to 15. b6 is LSB, b9 is MSB) b10 = mode (0 = spectator, 1 = normal player) b11..b17 = handicap (7-bit number. Must be in range 0..100). Note: Only host can change handicap values of the players in the battle (with HANDICAP command). These 7 bits are always ignored in this command. They can only be changed using HANDICAP command. b18..b21 = reserved for future use (with pre 0.71 versions these bits were used for team color index) b22..b23 = sync status (0 = unknown, 1 = synced, 2 = unsynced) b24..b27 = side (e.g.: arm, core, tll, ... Side index can be between 0 and 15, inclusive) b28..b31 = undefined (reserved for future use)

      • setBattleStatus

        public void setBattleStatus(int battleStatus)
